lyrics.stanza: God's intention is for Christ To be wrought into His chosen people That they may become the sons of God For His corporate expression.
We need to be rescued Out of the present evil age By the revelation of God's Son in us.
To live the Christian life Is to live the processed Triune God As the consummated Spirit.

God's goal is the divine sonship For His corporate expression As the household of the faith, The new creation, and the Israel of God; As the household of the faith, The new creation, and the Israel of God.
